Name: Industrial Control PC (Mini-ITX, 16GB RAM, SSD)
Description: High-performance PC for real-time control, running LinuxCNC or similar.

Name: PCIe Motion Control Card (e.g., Mesa 7I76E/7I76)
Description: High-speed interface for stepper drivers and I/O.

Name: NEMA23 Stepper Motor (3.0Nm, 4.2A)
Description: High-torque stepper motors for cable winding.

Name: Closed-Loop Stepper Driver (e.g., Leadshine HBS57)
Description: High-performance drivers for NEMA23 motors, with encoder feedback.

Name: 80/20 Aluminum Extrusion (40x80mm, 3m lengths)
Description: Heavy-duty frame for 6x6m footprint and 3m height.

Name: 80/20 Aluminum Extrusion Connectors & Fasteners
Description: For assembling the modular frame.

Name: Inline Force Sensor (S-Type Load Cell, 500N)
Description: Measures cable tension, 500N (approx 50kg) capacity.

Name: HX711 Load Cell Amplifier (with 24-bit ADC)
Description: Amplifies and digitizes load cell signals. Can be replaced by a single multi-channel industrial ADC.

Name: High-Strength Dyneema Cable (2mm, 50m roll)
Description: Strong, lightweight cable for suspension system.

Name: Stainless Steel Pulleys (low friction, bearing type)
Description: For smooth cable routing at each corner and along frame.

Name: Custom Cable Guides & Tensioners (3D Printed/Machined)
Description: To be designed/fabricated based on final cable path. Budget for materials/service.

Name: Robot Harness (Customizable, Nylon Webbing)
Description: Adjustable harness to attach to robot.

Name: Heavy-Duty Magnetic Breakaway Connectors (50kg pull force)
Description: Safety release mechanism for robot harness.

Name: Steel Enclosure (for Motor Controller Box)
Description: Secure housing for stepper drivers and control electronics.

Name: Large Emergency Stop Button (latching)
Description: Prominent, easily accessible safety button.

Name: AC Power Distribution Unit (PDU, 8 outlets)
Description: Provides centralized power for all AC components.

Name: 48V 10A Switching Power Supply (for motors)
Description: Powers two NEMA23 stepper motors each (2 supplies for 4 motors).

Name: 5V 5A DC Power Supply (for sensors/logic)
Description: Powers load cell amplifiers and other low-voltage components.

Name: Safety Netting (Dyneema or Nylon, 3x3m sections)
Description: Modular sections to create a perimeter safety barrier.

Name: High-Density Foam Floor Mats (1m x 1m, 2cm thick)
Description: Covers 6x6m area for crash protection.

Name: Industrial Grade Ethernet Cables
Description: For robust PC to motion controller connection and network access.

Name: Various Gauge Wiring (for power & signal)
Description: Internal wiring for motor controller box and sensor connections.

Name: Cable Glands / Strain Relief
Description: For professional cable entry/exit from enclosures.
